build.name: ghoghnoos
build.subject: base
build.globals:
export CPPFLAGS="-I/$PROJECT__RFS/usr/include/" export LDFLAGS="-L/$PROJECT__RFS/usr/lib64/"
export LIBS="-lxcb"
export X11_CFLAGS=$CPPFLAGS export X11_LIBS=$LDFLAGS
export FS_CFLAGS=$CPPFLAGS export FS_LIBS=$LDFLAGS
export ICE_CFLAGS=$CPPFLAGS export ICE_LIBS=$LDFLAGS
export SM_CFLAGS=$CPPFLAGS export SM_LIBS=$LDFLAGS
export XSCRNSAVER_CFLAGS=$CPPFLAGS export XSCRNSAVER_LIBS=$LDFLAGS
export XFONT_CFLAGS=$CPPFLAGS export XFONT_LIBS=$LDFLAGS
export XSETROOT_CFLAGS=$CPPFLAGS export XSETROOT_LIBS=$LDFLAGS
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$PROJECT__RFS/usr/lib64/"
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH="$PROJECT__RFS/usr/lib64/pkgconfig"
export XORG_PREFIX="$PROJECT__RFS/usr" export XORG_CONFIG="--prefix=$XORG_PREFIX --sysconfdir=$PROJECT__RFS/etc --localstatedir=$PROJECT__RFS/var --disable-static"

action.line:
cat > $PROJECT__RFS/etc/profile.d/xorg.sh <<-EOF export XORG_PREFIX="/usr" export XORG_CONFIG="--prefix=\$XORG_PREFIX --sysconfdir=/etc --localstatedir=/var --disable-static"
pathappend \$XORG_PREFIX/bin PATH pathappend \$XORG_PREFIX/lib/pkgconfig PKG_CONFIG_PATH pathappend \$XORG_PREFIX/share/pkgconfig PKG_CONFIG_PATH
pathappend \$XORG_PREFIX/lib LIBRARY_PATH pathappend \$XORG_PREFIX/include C_INCLUDE_PATH pathappend \$XORG_PREFIX/include CPLUS_INCLUDE_PATH
ACLOCAL='aclocal -I \$XORG_PREFIX/share/aclocal'
export PATH PKG_CONFIG_PATH ACLOCAL LIBRARY_PATH C_INCLUDE_PATH CPLUS_INCLUDE_PATH
EOF
